SUB_W18_WRLD_MIDO_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_WRLD_MIDO_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Huh. Popped out from a manhole.
Glad it didn't drop me underneath
the dang thing, at least.

SUB_W18_WRLD_MIDO_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_WRLD_MIDO_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Between the manhole and the city view,
it doesn't really feel like I've come to a
different world. Guess this means some
worlds are actually kinda similar, maybe?

SUB_W18_WRLD_MIDO_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_WRLD_MIDO_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, time to figure out my next move.
Let's see if I can't figure out where
I need to go next.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text: Huh? Wait, how am I in the Heavens?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, this is weird as all heck,
but if these fellas want a scrap,
I guess I'll give it to 'em!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
Huh. This here's clearly an elevator,
so what the heck was all that just now?
It felt different than when I passed
through Ama-no-Iwato, but... Well, dang. Am I seeing
things here, maybe?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text: No need to sound so surprised, is there? Well, unless you actually think I'm more surprising than whatever that just was?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey there, bud. Sorry for the big
reaction—I was just mulling something
over and you gave me a scare. Also,
what do you mean by 'that'?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
No need to play coy when I saw everything.
You got on the elevator, then this place got
real weird, then strange creatures showed up
and made a beeline straight for you! I'm guessing that means you're
what they were after.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
But you kept your cool and beat 'em down,
which was QUITE impressive. So do you know
something about everything that just went
down here or what?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text: Oh, I get it now! I was meant to hop into the elevator so we could meet up and you could guide me around!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text: ...We met five seconds ago and you think it's fate? You do realize that makes you sound like a creepy murderer, right? Eh, but I suppose I might as well take advantage of this little meet-cute.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
That said, I don't really want to have this
conversation in an elevator, so let's continue
it at my workplace. It's right up ahead.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_TO_CATHEDRAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_TO_CATHEDRAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Should be able to leave this
world through the manhole.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Okay, great. This is a much better place to
talk than an elevator—which again, seriously,
who wants to hang out in an elevator? Right then! Intros. I'm Shungiku Hanabusa,
ace reporter for the Capitol City Post,
among other places. Oh, but I wasn't born
here in the Union States.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Now hold on just a second there.
Did you say the 'Capitol City Post'?
So we're currently IN Capitol City?
As in, the capital of the Union States?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Ummm... Yes? We're in Capitol City.
You are one seriously weird dude, dude.
Do you really not know where you are?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Calendar! Gimme a calendar!
I mean, uh, please and thank you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
...Well, holy heck! It's the same day here
in the Union States' capital as when I
first set off for the Heavens! Is this even possible? Nah, can't be.
This must be a parallel world or
something—a different one from where
Miyako City is located. But then...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
You seem a bit wound up there, big guy.
You want a drink?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Okay, Tsunanori. Okay there, bud.
This is reality, so you just gotta
knuckle down and accept it. But my being guided here means this place
must have a spirit or two hanging around,
even though it's not the sort of place
I'd ever expect to find one...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Feeling a bit better? Great.
How about you just introduce yourself?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Right. Sorry, bud. That was super rude.
The name's Tsunanori Mido. I'm a student at
Miyako Imperial University in Miyako City,
and I've come here looking for spirits.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text: Miyako City? You mean the old capital of the East Islands? Oh man, I've always wanted to go there. Also, if you're really looking for spirits, why did you leave that place and come here? I've never even seen a spirit in Capitol City.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Yeah, I'm not too worried about that.
So long as I travel around with you,
Miss Hanabusa, I'll find what I need.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Ha ha ha! Oh man, it's been a LONG time
since someone called me 'Miss Hanabusa.'
Howzabout you just call me Lita, eh?
That's what everyone here does.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, look at the time!
The evening news is about to start. Sorry to interrupt our chat so I can
watch the tube, but us journalists
need to keep tabs on what's going on.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
No worries; that's the perfect chance for me
to learn more about this world. It can even
help me figure out if your Union States are
the same as the one I know, maybe.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Oh hey, that elevator deal made the news!
Looks like they don't know what caused it,
though—maybe the security camera was busted?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Whatever happened there isn't going to
show up on a security cam. People can go
to that other place, but stuff like cameras
always stay on this side. Also, the entire thing happened in an
instant, so the cameras wouldn't have
caught us going there, either.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
But we don't need the news, because I already
know who's behind all this. Are you ready?
Are you reeeally ready? Okay, here we go...
It was...aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
...
......
......... Yeah, that makes sense.
I mean, heck, nothing in this world
could do that kind of thing, eh?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Boy, you really took that in stride.
Most people think I'm joking or crazy
when I talk about aliens, and I end up
being laughed out of the room. But here's the thing: no one knows why the
aliens are here, which is why I've launched
a secret investigation to find out.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
You think there's a link between these
alien fellas and the upcoming presidential
election, maybe?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
That's my biggest fear; if aliens were
to interfere in the election, it would
essentially overthrow our democracy
at its very foundations!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
So far, it doesn't seem like they've been
trying to influence the election. But we're
entering the final stages now, so if they're
going to make a move, this is the time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Now then! Judging from—well, whatever you've
got going on there—you don't have a home base,
so you're welcome to crash here at my work for
a bit while you get that sorted out. Meanwhile, I'm going to head home.
I actually live on this floor—can't
beat a commute like that!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Can't believe there are spirits
in this world, and yet, here I am.
Also, I guess being here technically
makes me an illegal visitor? But even with all that, I still feel right at
home here—heck, I ALWAYS feel right at
home in worlds I don't know anything about.
Wonder why that is. Well, I won't figure that out if I just stand
here noodlin' on it until the sun comes up.
Better try and get some shut-eye.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.text:
Feelin' great, thanks. And heck, I really owe you one for putting
me up for the night. Lucky thing you were
the first person I ran into.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.text:
Flattery will get you nowhere with me.
You just seemed like a guy with a whole
lot of plates in the air, so I felt like you
should stay here instead of a hotel.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.text:
Oh, hey! It's time for
the morning news.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
I hear there's lots of money changing hands
right now. And yeah, the owner of that new
commercial building is a hotshot businessman,
but it's still a bit shady.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Oh, that reminds me! I heard from a friend at
the National Research Institute this morning,
and he really wants to meet you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Now hold on just a second there.
Does that mean the elevator deal...?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Yeah, I told my friend about it—but no details,
I promise! He doesn't know where you're from,
what you're here for, or anything like that.
You'll be fine talking to him, I promise. Hey, I'm a reporter, remember?
I protect my sources.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Still, I won't force you to meet up with him,
so if you'd rather go somewhere else first,
that's fine. I'll just be tagging along behind
you wherever you go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Don't remember you saying anything
about tailing me, bud.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
And I don't remember saying anything about
NOT tailing you—or about ignoring a juicy
story like 'Miyako City Student Comes to
Capitol City in Search of Spirits'! I mean, the idea of finding a spirit
here in Capitol City is a complete
fairy tale, you know?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Well, I suppose having you around would be pretty
handy, but I just wanna make double-sure you're
serious about that whole 'protect your sources'
deal—especially since that would be me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Fair enough. Also, I hate to even ask this
kind of thing, but you think you could lend
me some money, maybe? I'm flat busted.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
This story is clearly going to cost me in
more ways than one... But sure, we'll work
something out. Now let's get going already.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, you made it! Good, good. Excellent.
I'm Dr. Nishant, a researcher here at
the NRI. Please, come in, come in!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text:
So it's really okay for a fella like me
to just wander into your fancy institute?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, this area is open to all; it's just
a minor research space for my hobby. My actual laboratory is located elsewhere in
the facility—and of course, non-personnel
aren't allowed in there.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text: Hee hee! Your 'hobby.' I love it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
Aaand here we are! My hobby research space.
This little piece of equipment right here
is actually why I wanted to meet you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
I call it the 'Anti-Alien Battle Simulator'—
or A.B.S., for short. Tough name, right? Yes, well, as the name would indicate,
it's a simulator where you fight aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
And seeing as you have already repelled
some aliens, Mr. Mido, I would very much
like you to evaluate the device.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
Sure this is a good idea, bud? Not worried
the thing might explode and turn everybody's
hair white or something like that, maybe?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
Granted, this IS the first time I've had
a live test subject inside my simulator,
but I promise you that it's perfectly safe!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
Are we good here, Lita?
You think I can trust this man?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
Oh, I'm sure you'll be fine!
...Probably.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
Right then! If you would
be so kind, Mr. Mido?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
I got a real bad feeling
about this...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Fascinating! Having a living person inside
the simulator has produced a series of
entirely different results! If I can tweak the A.B.S. based on this data,
the quality of the simulation should improve
dramatically! I must get started at once...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text: Actually, guy, I think this science doohickey of yours is fine as-is—although I suppose the enemies were a little bit weak.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text: I intended them to be weak, sir! The simulation was based on reports of past incidents, as well as observations of the spatial distortions that occurred when other victims became involved.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Why, if I made them any stronger, we'd have
no hope of victory! ...Which I'm just now
realizing is such a difficult fact to accept
that it likely influenced my research. Damn you, blind-trial system! I am unworthy
to call myself a scientist! The whole purpose
of this is to find a means to oppose the aliens,
and I've gone and ruined it all!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Don't get low there, bud; I'm happy to keep
working with you. Let's you and me suss out
these aliens' weakness together, eh?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Sweet! I was hoping you'd say that.
Anyway, good luck with the continued
research on your hobby, Dr. Nishant.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Yes, yes, thank you—although I fear I've
been neglecting my actual work too much,
which the Institute will NOT be happy about. Well, I'll just have to do the best I can
on this in whatever spare time I have.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Feel free to use the simulator anytime,
Mr. Mido. I've already had an entry card
made for you, so you can access this part
of the lab even when I'm not here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Just don't spend all of your time on
this glorified arcade machine, or my
article is going to be VERY dull.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
You got it, bud. I'll make sure to
swing by lots of different places.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Whoa, what a commotion! There must
be some kind of incident going on!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Wait, bud! Aren't YOU following ME!?
...Cripes, I'd better get after her.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text: Hey there, John. What's going on?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Always quick to sniff out a
new story, aren't you, Lita? Well, turns out the crystal on display at
the Capitol has been stolen—and according to
eyewitness reports, the culprit JUMPED from
the Upper Layer down to the General! Crazy, right? Anyway, I'm trying
to dig up more evidence now.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Sounds like something a video game
character would do. You really think
this witness of yours is reliable?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm not at liberty to divulge details
of the investigation. That said,
let me know if you turn up anything
that might pertain to the case.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Heck, bud. You even have
connections with the police?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Any citizen should cooperate with the police.
That said, as an information source, they tend
to be a one-way street for reporters, so I'm
certainly not going to tell them anything.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Glad to hear it. Still, if this thief really
jumped all the way from the Upper Layer,
he can't be your ordinary fella.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text: I'm not a video game character, bud.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
You think so too, yeah?
Well, that seals the deal for me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Hey, you! What do think you're doing with
that crystal you stole from the Capitol!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text: I knew it! He's an alien!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text: We got him! I gotta call John.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
So are you really an
alien there, guy?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Caught the thief yourself, eh, Lita?
Impressive. I'll make sure you get an
official commendation from the force.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Don't. It'll just make gathering
info for stories that much harder.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Sure, sure, I getcha. We'll just say
a 'local citizen' cooperated in the
apprehension of the suspect.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, hopefully that's the end
of this whole alien deal.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
I wouldn't count on it. The police aren't going
to find anything—they never do. This will just
be reported as your run-of-the-mill theft with
some criminal out to make a quick buck.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
As much as you might expect for a glittery
thing that decorates the Capitol. However,
there have long been rumors about it not
being your ordinary crystal.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Which is why the aliens
are after it, maybe?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Might be, might not be. We don't know anything
about what the aliens want to do. Still, we've
thrown a wrench in the works for the moment,
which should help lead us to the next step.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
Well, I think it's about
time to call it a day.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
...Hmm? Oh, wait a minute.
I've got a message.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
'Secret meeting tonight between an
Allen supporter and one other individual.
Location: Grand Capitol Hotel lounge.'

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
This have something to do with
what you were saying after the
news this morning, maybe?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
Could be—and it'd be one heck of a scoop
to catch someone in the act! That said,
this could also be an intentional leak
by someone with other plans.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text: I ain't much for being used.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text: Only one way to know for sure.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
Yeah, I don't feel like risking my
credibility as a journalist on something
this flimsy. Let's just head home.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
Look! That's the bigshot owner of that new
commercial facility. And like the tip said,
he's with one of Allen's supporters—a
local politician of some renown.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text: Oh, it's a big deal. Wining and dining someone at a place like this stinks like week-old fish. Still, the candidate was smart enough to use a middleman, which blunts the impact.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
But the fact a political mover and shaker
like this is meeting with the owner gives
me all the dirt I need for a major story.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
Now c'mon. Let's head back so I can
get this thing written. Heh heh heh...

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
Definitely don't care for the
look on your face, bud...

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Good work today! Now let's
check out the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_000.text:
So that's how things are looking at the moment.
But they report on each candidate's approval
ratings every day, so this could totally swing
the other direction by tomorrow.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Yep. Seems like a pretty
big deal, all right.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_020.text:
That's because it is.
Anyways, let's call it a night.
I'll see you tomorrow, 'kay?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning, sunshine!
Now quick, turn on the news!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_000.text:
Can't believe they already reported
on that secret meeting. You leak the
information to 'em or something?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_010.text:
I sure did. This could be a huge story,
so I have to strike while the iron's hot.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_020.text:
Remind me not to become
your enemy there, bud.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_000.text:
That deal about people getting cut is pretty
strange, but is it really that big a story?
I mean, folks get hurt in cities all the time.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_010.text: Well, what the news didn't mention is that the people being attacked all have lots of social influence.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_020.text:
It's also happening to people who tend to
work alone—internet celebrities and that
sort of thing—rather than politicians or
businesspeople who are always with others.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_030.text:
Also, none of the victims have any idea who
could have attacked them. This stinks to
high heaven of aliens. Aliens, I tell you!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_040.text:
All right then. Also, you're a journalist
with lots of social influence, so try to
be careful out there, yeah?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_050.text:
Aw, I've got nothing to worry about now that
you're here! Now c'mon—you've got places
you want to go, and I'm going with you!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_060.text:
Sort of a weird way to say that,
but hey, you betcha.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_000.text:
Are you interested in the debate they
mentioned on the news? I could use my
press pass to get in if you want.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_010.text:
Hey, yeah. I bet you reporter types get
invited to all sorts of important things.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_020.text:
I'm not a reporter 'type'! I'm an
investigative journalist with a nose
for the big scoops. That said, I don't HAVE to go to the
debate, so I'll leave it up to you.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_030.text:
And sure, it'll be packed with reporters
and broadcast across Capitol City, but
I bet you'll see some things in person
that you'd miss otherwise.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_040.text:
News reports aren't everything, you know.
Sometimes you have to just get out there,
grab life by the lapels, and shake it
until you see what falls out!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_050.text:
Yeah, I suppose I'd still be in the dark
about these alien fellas if I only listened
to the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_060.text:
See? You get it. So if you want to see the
debate, I'll just say you're my assistant. ...We're going, right?
Say we're going!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I know I'm sort of dragging you into my work
here, so lemme give you the lowdown. Basically,
debates are a venue in which participants share
their opinions on topics determined in advance.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Hmm. Strange. The moderator generally keeps
things moving, but this one is coming off a
little weird. It's almost like he's backing
James Allen on everything he says...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Maybe he just wants to vote for
the guy and doesn't hide it well.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
It's possible—but as a professional moderator,
it would be a massive breach of ethics.
I just can't imagine him doing that.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Makes sense. I mean, heck, I've got no idea
which guy you're backing in this whole deal.
You keep your cards pretty well hidden.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_FORUM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Ugh. This is about as far from a 'fair' exchange
of ideas as you can get. I'm glad I got to see
this in person; we might not have noticed his
subtle bias if we weren't sitting here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey there, Doc. I'm here to take
your simulator for a spin.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, Mr. Mido! Welcome, welcome.
Now then, what level would you
like the simulation set to?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
I dunno. What sort of alien data
are you lookin' for here?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text: Let's gather more data on enemies we can beat.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text: Let's make a guess at the capabilities of a normal alien.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_010.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_010.text:
Oh, but this data is WONDERFUL!
Please do come back soon.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
I briefly considered having you stay here,
but then I thought better of it. It's a place
for VIPs, which means it's super pricy.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I'm not a real
bucks-up kind of fella.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text: Me either—although it is nice to treat yourself to a fancy dinner every now and again.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh hey, is that tree there in
the middle of the lobby real?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
It sure is—although it used to be outside.
See, it was here when the hotel was built
over a hundred years ago, and the man who
founded this place really loved it. Some time ago, a redevelopment plan was
launched for Capitol City that involved
cutting it down, but the hotel fought it
tooth and nail.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Eventually, they reached an agreement where
the redevelopment plan paid for the tree to
be replanted inside the hotel. As the hotel tells it, there were concerns
the tree might immediately wither and die,
but it perked right back to life because
the founder's soul lives on inside it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Anyway, enough of that! I didn't get any
tips that require me to be here today,
so how about we get going?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.text:
Hey, sorry, but I just got contacted by
a friend. Mind if we head somewhere?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.text:
Apparently there was a spatial distortion
sighted in a particular section of the
General Layer, and I'm thinking it might
be connected to the aliens. Wanna go?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.text:
Oh wow. If YOU'RE saying that,
I should definitely reconsider.
We'll just head home instead.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
According to my source, this is the place
where the spatial distortion was seen.
...Huh? What in the—

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
Whatever it was, it tried to pull you into
that other dimension—so I went in and
took out the folks on the other side.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
Oh my gosh, this explains the people who
are being cut! Since they're being hurt
in a different dimension, it seems to
be happening instantaneously!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
We might have been lured out, but thanks to you,
we were able to turn the tables on the culprit.
Case closed, and no one is the wiser! Now let's
get back so I can fill my friend in on all this.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Good work today.
And now, it's news time!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_000.text:
So that's what we're looking at today.
Those two men are vying for the presidency,
and the news is giving us a good idea
of what each one stands for.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Sure seems like this election's going to
determine the future of the Union States.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Oh, you don't know the half of it.
The current president has done a lot,
so there's a heavy responsibility
waiting for whoever takes over. Do we develop the Union States further,
or do we seek stability instead?
It's going to be a tough choice.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_040.text:
I know I don't exactly have the right to vote
here, but seein' as I swung by during election
season, I might wanna see what's happening
in the city at a time like this.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning! Man, I slept like a ROCK.
Now then, I wonder what fascinating
mysteries might await us today.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_000.text:
So she's finally making her
major label debut, eh?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_010.text:
I know this song! My sister can't stop
listening to it. Guess this lady's a real
big deal over here too, yeah?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_020.text:
Oh, she's massively talented. Like they said
on the news, she was huge even before the
label decided to sign her.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_030.text:
Entertainment news is outside my wheelhouse,
so I totally forgot today was her big album
launch. But, uh, we can go check it out if
you're curious about her.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_040.text: Sure, I'll give it a think.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_050.text:
Ha! Easy-breezy, just like always.
Now let's get going.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_000.text:
So she's finally making her
major label debut, eh?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_010.text:
Lady must be seriously popular to be
pulling this much press in the middle
of a presidential election.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_020.text:
Oh, she's massively talented—she was
huge even before the label signed her.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_030.text:
And while I'm curious about her debut, I'm even
more curious about public sentiment around the
election—and there's no way to do that other than
picking the brains of Joe and Jane Lunchpail!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_040.text:
Seems folks around here are pretty
open with their opinions.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Whoa, there's already a ton of people here!
Guess I shouldn't be surprised, seeing as
she's giving a free concert.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, we won't get anywhere near the stage
at this rate. But if you like her music, I'll let
you listen to everything I've downloaded
when we get back to the office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_SINGER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, if we can't talk about how great it
was to see her live, I guess we'll just
have to soak up the atmosphere instead.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Huh? What are you two doing here?
You really should leave.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Did something happen? Biohazard breach!?
Radiation leak!? Dimensional tear!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Oh, some of our alternative-energy equipment
has spiraled out of control and is now in
danger of exploding. Nothing major.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Cripes, guy! Why the heck are you
fiddling with stuff like that in the
middle of a city!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_05.text:
It's small-scale equipment that's contained
behind a three-stage barrier—so even if there
IS an explosion, the laboratory isn't at risk. We just want people to evacuate
out of an abundance of caution.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Okay, but that still doesn't explain why
you're running an out-of-control energy
experiment in the middle of the city.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Well, everything was simply peachy through
yesterday—but when I increased the output
for today's test, we suddenly lost control. Before I fled the lab, I saw a strange device
attached to the control unit. I think it's
the cause of all this, but I don't know what
it is, much less how to stop it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_08.text:
Smells like sabotage to me.
You think it's the aliens?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Does this device have a bunch 
of triangles on it, maybe?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_10.text:
Actually...yes. Yes, it does.
Do you know something, Mr. Mido?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Yeah, I may have seen something like that.
Can't promise I'll be able to do anything,
but probably worth it for me to look it
over and give it a shot.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_00.text:
No reason for you to be here, bud!
This could be dangerous!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_01.text:
I'm not going to stand around
and miss the scoop of the century,
thank you very much!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_02.text: Er, actually, everything you see here is highly, highly classified, so you can't write about any of this unless you want a scary visit from some very large men.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_06.text:
I said I'd give it a shot, fella, so
that's exactly what I'm gonna do.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_00.text:
Control has been restored!
The levels are dropping!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_01.text:
And that dang alarm finally quit all
the hollerin', which is great.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_02.text:
You did it! Hooray for you!
Also, now I can write my article.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_03.text:
Did you not hear what I said earlier?
Confidential! Secrets! Very large men!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_04.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_04.text:
Which is all the more reason I HAVE to write it.
This is clearly part of an alien attack, which means
they know the National Research Institute is part
of our anti-alien efforts!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_05.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_05.text:
And if you're right and they can attack us
like this whenever they please, we have no
real way to fight back! Please, Lita. Most of my colleagues at the
Institute have nothing to do with aliens.
I can't drag them into this.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_07.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_07.text:
Yes, well, I have to clean up this
incid... Er, this 'unusual situation.'
I will see you both some other time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_030_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_000_CUT_030_00.text:
Nope. Can't do it. That alarm is drillin'
a hole right through my goshdarn skull.
I gotta back off and get my thoughts
in some kind of order here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELEMENT_010_CUT_000_00.text: Okay, let's give it another shot.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
My news magazine is based in this office
building, along with a number of other
businesses. Oh, and it also has this
delightful little cafe!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Are you nuts!? Allen is CLEARLY the right
choice! What's Bailey ever done, huh?
Nothing! A big stinking pile of nothing!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Capitol City's economy is amazing right now
because of Allen. And if he wins, things are
only going to get better!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Sorry, but I just don't agree. Sure, Allen is
proactive with business, science, and tech—
and yes, we'll likely be a stronger country if he
wins—but he's just too much of a hard-liner.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
But with Bailey, you get someone who's steady
and even-keeled. You get a sense of stability,
which is just as important as growth.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, well. Looks like some of my neighbors
are engaged in a heated political debate.
You get this a lot during election season.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey! You there!
What do YOU think about all this!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Easy, Violetta! You can't just grill
people about their personal beliefs.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, I don't mind—besides which, I very much
want to hear what my new companion thinks.
He always mumbles something vague and mealy,
so let's hold some feet to the fire!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Boy howdy, Lita's really on a roll.
No way I can duck the question now.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
So how about it, new guy? Based on the
campaign so far, who do YOU support!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text: I'd have to go for Allen.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Right!? RIGHT!? You gotta go with the
tried-and-tested record of success!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
An excellent choice. A president should
bring a sense of stability to the job,
instead of flash and trickery.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
And there you have it, Tsunanori!
Your very first political debate!
Did you enjoy it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Might've meant more if I could
actually cast a dang vote.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.text:
Hmm... That woman looks rather
out of place for the Institute.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.text:
My journalist senses are kicking in hard.
Let's follow her!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.text:
Boy, cracking that code really took it
out of you. But sure, we can head back.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_00.text:
Hey, you just came out of the NRI, right?
Cutting a pretty weird path through the
city, don't you think? What's your deal?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
This has gotta be a warning
from those alien fellas.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Doctor Nishant really picked a
terrible time to lose his nerve.
What the hell are we supposed to—

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Hold it. You two were the ones lurking
around during the incident at the
National Research Institute today.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
I'm Bonnie Blair, and this little
rascal here's Formina Franklyn. We're with the Capitol City Police Department, but
we're currently on loan to the Office of the President—
so you two cowpokes can just think of this as a
friendly little chat with the president's office!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
We've already spoken to the director of the
Institute—one Doctor Nishant—so please
hold nothing back during our questioning.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
If you already talked to him, we've got
nothing to add. The two of us don't know
anything about what goes on in the NRI.
We just happened to be there, is all.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
And the creatures you call 'aliens'?
What about them?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Hey, you're the ones working for the president,
so maybe stop asking me these inane questions
and go DO SOMETHING ABOUT THEM before this
all explodes into a serious incident!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
The Office of the President is well aware of
the situation—and while it won't get any public
attention, I can assure you the NRI has been
directed to continue its activities as before.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Also, y'all didn't ask for my opinion,
but I don't believe in aliens or UFOs
or any of that. All a buncha horse plop,
if ya don't mind my sayin' so.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Then I guess there's nothing
more for us to discuss.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
It certainly was—but let's
leave him be for now.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.text:
Cripes, bud! You okay? Dunno what that
lady was in such a hurry about.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.text:
Oh, who knows? And yes, I'm fine.
Just surprised, is all.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.text: Should we go after her, maybe?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, I was getting some weird vibes from
her, too. C'mon, she went this way!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_00.text:
Hey there. You bumped into me earlier—
which is totally fine, these things happen.
We were just concerned that something
might be wrong. Why the big hurry?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_00.text:
This ain't good.
I think she's a dang alien!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Can't believe we bumped into an alien
right here in the city. I swear I'm a
magnet for this kind of stuff...

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Goodness gracious! I detected a distortion
in space-time and came here to investigate,
and what should I find but the pair of you! So, er, was there an alien here?
Did I miss it?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Yeah, but we handled it. That said,
I'm actually surprised you came out
of your lab to see it in person.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
I suspect the alien you tangled with is the
one responsible for the incident at the NRI.
I couldn't risk it coming into contact with any
of the other researchers, so I came straightaway.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Wait, did something happen
at the lab!? Are you okay!?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Oh, I'm quite well, thank you.
Our three-stage barrier managed
to prevent a large-scale explosion.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
What kind of incident are we
talking about here, fella?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, this is all off the record, but the
National Research Institute is currently
researching alternative energy—and it's a
very challenging thing to keep under control! But this morning, someone attached a device
to the control system that caused a good deal
of interference—hence the exploding and the
booms and whatnot.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Oh, I getcha. And you think the fella who
attached that doohickey to your energy
deal was the alien we just tussled with.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Meaning the alien wanted your research
to fail, and was willing to go to any
lengths to make it happen. I'm just glad the lab's barrier prevented
an even greater catastrophe here.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text: Heck, Lita, we only found that alien because it bumped into you on the street. You really are a magnet for this kind of stuff.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, seeing as the two of you have dealt with
the culprit, I should head back to the NRI and
get started on the repair work. Oh, and my little
laboratory is safe too, so don't worry about that.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So now that I'm thinking about it, the only
anti-alien folks that I know about are you
and Dr. Nishant from the NRI. But that can't
be all of 'em, eh?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm in direct contact with about ten people,
but for the safety of the organization,
none of us knows everyone's identity.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Which means even the fella
next door could be a member.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Or he could be an alien. But hey, the unknown
factor you get with lots of strangers living
in close proximity is what makes a city great.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_040.text: Anyways, let's see what's on the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Three days to go until the election,
and the aliens are busier than ever.
This is honestly exhausting.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Heck, bud, you're a big-shot journalist
AND a big-shot alien hunter. That's a
heck of a double play, you betcha.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_020.text:
I just wish they'd make a move already,
because my nerves are pretty frazzled.
Anyway, good night.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning. I don't imagine there's going to be
anything big going down today, but we should
check the news anyway.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_000.text:
Looks like I was right and the candidates
aren't planning any big moves—which is my
chance to go track down a huge scoop in
the form of a personal-interest story!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_020.text:
Oh, finding a story about someone's private
life is the scoopiest of scoops.
Now let's get out into the world and
track down something interesting!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_030.text:
I can't believe how much energy
you have for this kind of thing.
But hey, good on you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Those cats have really taken a shine
to you there, bud. They all yours?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, heavens no! I'm just taking care of
them. These kitties belong to everyone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Stray cats tend to gather in this particular
corner of the Inspectorate, and Jessica here
is always kind enough to take care of them.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_030.text: Oh, there's no need for praise, dearie; I love taking care of my special kittens! Honestly, even though I'm on the staff here, I sometimes feel like taking care of them is my real job.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_040.text: Hey, look over there. Is that...?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Goodness, there's clearly no escaping
the watchful eye of a talented reporter! But yes, dear, that's Noah Bailey, the
presidential candidate. He's helping to
clean up this area—and doing so on the
'down-low,' as the children like to say.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Even though he's a very important politician,
he's always wandering around town picking up
trash and cleaning graffiti. Oh, but please
don't put any of this in a story!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Why all the secrecy? The voters would go
nuts if they knew a politician was wandering
around cleaning up trash.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
If the whole world learned he was doing this,
he couldn't stay on the down-low—and that
means the trash wouldn't get cleaned anymore!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Well, this is a real dilemma. My journalistic
senses are screaming for me to turn this into
a story, but I also understand what Jessica
is saying about it ruining Bailey's good work.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
Hey, the fella's out there doing good.
Folks should know about that.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_010_050.text:
That is so adorably innocent, I want to
hug you until your stuffing falls out. Still, I love it—and since I don't know for
sure which option would help Bailey more,
I'll just write the best story I can.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_010_060.text:
You're right. Bailey genuinely seems to
be doing a good thing here, and turning
that into a scoop for my own personal
gain feels pretty skeezy.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_CATS_000_CUT_010_070.text:
No, yeah. Exactly. Probably better for the
guy if he can stay on the 'down-low.'

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, now we're in the other dimension!?
This must mean...

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Yep. Just like that time in the elevator.
Be careful, bud—there's no telling where
the bad folks might be comin' from.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Then you have already named everyone
in this place as your enemy?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
You're the folks who attacked me outta
nowhere last time, fella, so don't stand
there and pretend we're all buds now.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Tsk! So belligerent. Did it ever occur to you
to approach a problem with dialogue instead
of simply running straight at it? I can offer
good terms, if you are willing to listen.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
I know you are traveling in search of spirits,
and can secure one for you. Once you have it,
you will be free to move on to the next stop
along your journey. A fine offer, is it not?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
I don't know how or where you got that
info, guy, but you're spot on. So...

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: I'll take that spirit, thanks.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: Sorry, but things have changed.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm pleased you were willing to parley,
and leave the rest to you.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Getting a spirit from you just feels wrong
somehow—so if it's all the same, I'm gonna
kick around this world for a while.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Are you certain you wish to refuse?
I'll not make such an offer again.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: Eh, you're right. I'll take the spirit.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: No means no, guy.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
A pity it had to come to this.
Ah, well. Death it is, then.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Got my hands on a spirit.
Guess that guy was telling the truth.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
He didn't seem much like an alien,
but then again, who knows?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, I made a deal with an alien and got
the power of a spirit, which means I'm
ready to say goodbye to this world. While I'm curious how this whole election
deal's gonna shake out, I've got things that
need doing. Thanks for everything, bud.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, so you're just going
to abandon me!?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Hey, I'm just some guy passing through.
Not really my job to save the entire
Union States, yeah?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, I suppose I may have assumed a bit
much there—but you're just so dang strong!
Can't blame a girl for dreaming, right?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
You got better things to do than dream
about a fella like me, Lita. So long.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Those alien folks must really have their backs
to the wall if they're trying to do junk like this.
And I know you're also in a tough spot, Lita,
but let's try to give it one more push.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Are you sure about this? I thought the
whole reason you came here was so you
could try to find some spirits.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
I've got a strict 'never trust aliens' policy
there, bud. I'm way better off letting you
drag me around.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
That was merely a test of your strength.
I thought you had realized as much.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Fella, you're really starting to tick
me off. What do you want now?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
We are the same as you: we have each
come to this world with an objective. We do not wish to interfere with your goal,
nor do we want you to interfere with ours.
I seek only to know what your objective is.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I'm here looking for spirits.
That's it.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Spirits? I have seen no indication such things
even exist in this world. However, if that is
your objective, I would ask that you pursue
only this and nothing more.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Ever considered just comin' right out and
sayin' you don't want me pokin' my nose
into business that isn't mine? Don't mean
to be rude, but I don't care for you, bud. It's not like I've got getting in your way on
my to-do list, but where I go and what I do
is up to me, so how about you wait until
I make trouble before you get on my case?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
We are well aware of your strength, and seek
no quarrel with you. We hope only that you
achieve your goal in short order.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Was that an alien? What happened?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
A warning, I guess? Or maybe they
were just scouting things out. Long story short, they told me to stay the
heck outta their business—seems like they've
had eyes on me since this whole mess started. I'm just hoping they won't go kicking
up any fuss in the future.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
As a reporter, I welcome all the fuss I can
handle—but as a member of the anti-alien
organization, I'd rather not provoke them until
we have a better idea what we're dealing with.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Fair enough, bud. I'll keep that in mind
when I'm choosing what to do next.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text:
I hear someone sent a tip to the
police from the Metropolitan Building.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text:
Wait, hold on a second.
How'd you get a police tip?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text:
Stop worrying about minor details
and let's just check it out already!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text: What? No! It could be a bomb!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text: Heck yeah, let's get that scoop!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text:
Heck, now you've got ME worried!
Fine, fine. We'll head home.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
The building alarms inside are going off,
but it doesn't look like the police have
arrived quite yet.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
Score another one for your reporter
instincts, huh? You think it's a thief?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
I see somebody skulking around!
Got your camera ready, bud?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
I've ALWAYS got my camera ready.
Also, it looks like the cops just showed.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
Aw, hell. Lita? How'd you get here
before we did—or were you actually
the one who tipped us off?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
We happened to be passing by when we heard the
alarm—and when I heard breaking glass, I started
taking photos. There could be something useful
there, so feel free to take a look.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
Appreciate it. Now let's see what we've got...
Hold the damn phone! Forget 'something useful,'
you've got shots of the window moments after it
broke. Almost feels too good to be true.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
If you have any suspicions, you know how to
find me. Oh, and while I'm happy to testify 
to whatever you need, right now I'm out.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
The alarm that went off was located in
Allen's campaign office. This whole thing
stinks to high heaven if you ask me!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
Did someone set it up so
you'd be here, maybe?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text: I guess we'll find out tomorrow.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_000.text:
You know, I just thought of something:
there's an elevator in the Upper Layer
that we've never used, yeah?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, you mean the one between the Capitol
and the Inspectorate? Yeah, they don't
let normal folks access that.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_020.text:
It connects right to the president's office,
so it's locked down for security purposes.
Only the president or members of his
cabinet are allowed to use it.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_030.text: Oh. Yeah, guess that makes sense.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I know it probably seems all mysterious
and exciting to you, but the president's
office is actually pretty boring.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_000.text:
An attack on a campaign office?
That's trouble right there.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_010.text:
That sort of thing happen
often around here?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_020.text:
No, never. But this election has basically
become a duel between the two candidates,
and their supporters are desperate.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_030.text:
And sure, previous elections in the Union
States always had your typical skullduggery,
but it was nothing like this.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_040.text:
In any event, I'm headed back to my
place to finish some work. Good night.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_040_000.text: Morning! Let's pop the news on.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
So it was all an inside job, eh?
I guess that's one explanation.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
If that's the case, that Allen fella
is really boxed into a corner.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
Which means this might be a much bigger crisis
than they're letting on. Allen's camp has clearly
put their foot in it, but I'm not sure we should
think about it so simply.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
You mean the folks who don't like Allen
might've used you to make sure the story
came out? That's dirty pool, right there.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
If they did, they're gonna find
that I don't come cheap.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.text:
Harassment, huh? Bailey's side will deny it
to their dying breath, but it's hardly
surprising that they're suspected—and this
is the kind of thing that can swing a vote.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.text:
Looks like they don't have any idea
who actually did it though, yeah?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.text: The public doesn't care who actually did it; they're all about the scandal. That's why you always get an endless stream of this kind of thing during elections.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_070_000.text:
Anyway, time for us to get
out there and seize the day!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_000.text:
Looks like there won't be any major
election-related events today.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_010.text:
That said, unexpected things are sure to
crop up—things like this office incident—
