so I'm going to put the job of discovering
them into your capable hands!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_020.text:
How the heck did that
become my job?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text: Greetings, humans! I am an alien!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, how convenient! I've been
wanting to interview an alien. So which planet do you hail from?
Or are you from another galaxy entirely?
I assume you use a flying saucer, right? Also, how do you like the food?
Oh, and are you here all alone,
or did you come in a group?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text: You talking to me there, guy?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Sounds like this fella's got
questions of his own.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Have you ever even seen an alien before?
And I mean besides me, so don't go saying
'I'm looking at one right now.'

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I don't WANT to meet an alien—also,
your little street show here sucks,
so I'm not leaving a tip. Let's go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
In this insular little world, outsiders have
long been viewed as witches and monsters—
and now aliens as well! Ah, but how will they deal with interference
that truly comes from outside their world?
It is ever so interesting...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_000.text:
The coffee here is amazing, and the hotel cafe
sells the roasted beans so you can have it at
home. Let's drop in for a minute, 'kay?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_010.text:
This where you get the stuff you brew
every morning? 'Cause it's real tasty.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_020.text: Oh, look! Emily's in the cafe!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_030.text:
She's that crooner who had her big debut
the other day, yeah? You gonna snap some
candid photos of her on the sly, maybe?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Hi, there! You're Emily Bryant,
right? I'm a big fan.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I'm a reporter named Lita Caryx—oh,
and this is my assistant, Tsunanori.
I don't really cover entertainment,
but it's still awfully nice to meet you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Aw, that's great! It's nice
to meet you guys, too.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You seem to be alone.
Are you waiting for someone?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_100.text: Yeah, I'm meeting my agent here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_110.text:
No surprise someone as popular as you
would have a busy schedule—and how crazy
is it that you made your big debut just
before the election!? You've got a lot of guts; I would have
been worried about my album getting
lost in all the noise.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Yeah, that was a risk, but I wanted to get it
out during the election so my music wouldn't
be tied to any particular president, you know? And since I can keep any spotlight on me focused
on news about the debut, I don't have to deal with
a bunch of annoying interviews from people who
want to know which of the candidates I support.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_130.text:
I guess that's one way
to think of it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Hee hee! Speaking of which, THIS is
starting to feel like an interview!
Guess you really are a journalist, huh?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Does it!? Oh gosh, sorry about that.
I wasn't trying to do that, I swear.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Aw, it's okay. And since you're a fan,
I'm gonna go ahead and skip my usual
interview fee. Whoops! I see my agent there.
Gotta go!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Thanks for talking with me,
and good luck with everything!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Wow, you really went
all-in there.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_190.text:
C'mon, you're telling me it wasn't great
to see a cutie like her up close?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text: Well, I'll be hog-tied and tossed in a barrel! More aliens!?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
We're going to have more alien sightings
than we know what to do with if we keep
trying to chase down all of these leads.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text: Yeah, I reckon this is just another street performance—which don't make a lick of sense, because who in their right mind wants to see someone pretendin' to be an alien!? I swear, I had no idea bein' an investigator would be so much work.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
So the CCPD is chasing aliens now?
I had no idea...

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
You read my mind. If this is about
aliens, we can't ignore it. C'mon!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
Good point. If those two want to waste their
time chasing after a bunch of half-baked
street performers, that's their problem.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Hmm. He vanished. Perhaps these aliens
are more real than we gave them credit
for initially.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text: Or we just mistook what we saw.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm Lita Caryx with the Post.
Did something happen?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, just a little spate of street performers
actin' like aliens. We ain't managed to run
any of 'em down yet, but maybe y'all have?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
We have, actually—and they weren't remotely
entertaining. Frankly, you're better off just
leaving them be...unless there's something
criminal about their activities?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Our information suggests there is
one odd 'alien' out here somewhere. Unfortunately, we can't pin down exactly
what is odd about them—just that they are.
Hence our investigation.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, the man we ran into wasn't particularly
odd, unless you count being the world's least
entertaining entertainer as odd.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
We appreciate your cooperation. Here is our
contact information. Please get in touch if
you come across anything of note.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Huh? This says you work for the
Presidential Security Office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Aw, that's just temporary.
We're sorta on loan to 'em from
the Capitol City Police Department.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sounds like the president might be trying to
do something about the aliens. This calls
for some good old-fashioned sleuthing!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
I hope I go the rest of my life without
running into an 'alien' street performer.
Was there some kind of incident?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Our investigation is designed to prevent an
incident from occurring. We received information
about an odd 'alien' somewhere in the city—
not that I place any stock in such things.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
If you ask little ol' me, aliens and
UFOs and whatnot ain't nothin'
but a big pile'a horse plop.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Here is our contact information.
Please get in touch if you come
across anything of note.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Home sweet home!
C'mon, let's watch the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Allen's quote about the
plane is pretty odd.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_030.text:
I mean, sure, the Union States leads the world
in a lot of technological areas, but VTOL for
passenger planes is a pipedream's pipedream.
It'd be more magic than science.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_040.text:
Can the ground withstand it? Is everyone aware of
how difficult it would be to control? There are all
kinds of technical hurdles to overcome, and some
of those are a long way from being solved. I know Allen likes to talk
a big game, but still.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_050.text:
You think he's got some
kind of angle, maybe?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_060.text:
I do—although I hope my instincts are
wrong. Anyway, see you tomorrow.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_070.text:
Instincts, eh? Crud, now I'm worried.
Gut feelings are usually dead-on.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning! ...Uh, what's up?
You look concerned.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_010.text:
Me? Nah, I'm fine, bud.
Let's check out the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_070_000.text:
Okay, that's all good to know.
Now let's get rolling!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_000.text:
So what are these presidential
campaign rallies like?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_010.text:
The candidate gets up on stage and gives a fiery
speech to hype their own supporters and drum up
new ones. Gathering people together in person
like that helps to build a sense of solidarity.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_020.text:
Also, some candidates go press the flesh
with their supporters after the speech,
so a lot of people come just to try and
meet someone famous.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_030.text:
Which gives 'em even more support, eh?
Guess I see why they'd do this kind
of thing before an election.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_040.text:
You want to check it out? They let anybody
in there, so if you're interested, just pop
on over to the venue at Metro Square.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay, this is weird. What's with the heckling?
Everyone at this rally should all be on the
same page about Bailey.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Whaddaya mean Bailey isn't here!?
You're supposed to be on top of this!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Rally_Officer
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Everything is fine, sir. A car accident
has snarled traffic around the area,
but he should be arriving shortly.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_04.text:
That's because our traffic policies are
USELESS! Also, the fact he's making his
possible constituents wait is PROOF
Bailey doesn't take us seriously!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Boy howdy, that fella's really stirring
the pot. And since nobody likes to be
kept waiting, I imagine he'll have this
whole place foamin' at the mouth soon.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, if he won't speak, then I will!
In fact, I'll give a speech so good,
Bailey is SURE to win!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Okay, this is getting way out of hand.
I'm not going to be able to cover the
rally at this rate.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_08.text:
Oh, look who it is. Perfect timing.
You're coming with me!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Oh, cripes! A bunch of guys are
dragging Lita off somewhere!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_000_00.text:
I bet this'll be way more fun than
busting up the campaign rally.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Do you even know who I AM, you idiot!?
There are serious penalties for interfering
with the press in this country!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, I know exactly who you are...
which is why you and me are gonna
go somewhere VERY far away!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Looks like you're having a real wild
time, fella. Mind letting me in on it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_010_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_010_00.text:
These alien fellas are getting
more direct—and more sloppy.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_010_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_010_01.text:
Right!? I mean, interfering this blatantly
in a democratic election is NOT going to
fly with me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_010_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_010_CUT_010_02.text:
Just make sure you don't
overdo it, okay?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_00.text:
We're getting to the good part of the
rally now. Just listen to those cheers!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_01.speaker: Rally_Officer
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_01.text:
Hey, you're that pair from earlier.
You two all right?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_02.text:
We sure are! We talked everything out and
convinced those people to turn around
and just call it a day.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_04.speaker: Rally_Officer
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_04.text:
They were...crying? Okay, that's weird.
Also, who even were they? Did someone
hire them to sabotage Bailey's rally?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_05.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_05.text:
I asked them about that, but they wouldn't say.
Probably for the best, since anything that came
out of their mouths would assuredly be a lie.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_06.speaker: Rally_Officer
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MEETING_040_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, the rally went off without a hitch,
so I'll stop speculating. Thanks so much
for all of your help today.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Goodness, dearie! We certainly are
seeing a lot of each other lately.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Or maybe it's just that you've been
spending more time outside.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, I suppose that's true. There's just so
much to investigate in our work that I have
to take a breather every now and again.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
In addition to watching out for the usual
election-season shenanigans, the head of the
Security Office has also been acting oddly.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Well then, it's time for me to get back
to work. Good luck out there, dearie!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Yep. Someone's definitely
stirring up trouble.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
You talking about the shenanigans,
or the other thing?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
The other thing. The head of the Presidential Security
Office is a man named Tristan Hernandez. He's an old
military buddy of the president—they were both
heroes during the Channel War.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Being chief of the Security Office is a more
modest job than you'd think, but the president
apparently trusts Hernandez more than anyone.
And if he's behaving strangely...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Sounds to me like Jessica knew you'd pick
up on that, which is exactly why she leaked
it to you. What a sly old bird.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Well, I get how we're suspicious of this
Security Office fella, but how exactly
do we even find him?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Thankfully, I've got a lead on that.
We just need to sit tight and wait
for him to pass by here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Your information network
really is top-drawer, bud.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Look! There's Hernandez!
And he's alone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Think it's a coincidence he's not
with the president right now?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Could be, but he's in charge of the entire
Secret Service. It's very strange for him
not to at least have some other security
officers around...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Lita, I just detected a spatial
distortion near your location.
Have you been attacked again?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
No, nothing's going on here.
We're totally fine.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Ah, that's a relief! Well, the distortion
was brief as usual, so I wouldn't worry.
Talk to you soon.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Hm... You know, if we're not the only ones
who can get caught up in these weird
spatial anomaly things...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
You think this Hernandez
fella was hoppin' around
in that other dimension!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
That's exactly what I think—AND I think
he was holding a secret meeting.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
But we've only ever bumped into aliens
over there. So you think the chief and the
aliens are connected somehow, maybe?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Is the president aware of his activities,
or is Hernandez acting alone? Either way,
this is a major development.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
There's not enough evidence to go public,
but we've got a lead now—and I never let
a lead escape.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Another day finished up.
Let's see what's on the tube.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Things sure have been eventful in the
lead-up to the election, huh? I haven't
had a moment's rest since you got here.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Oh, but don't get me wrong—I'm not griping.
Always better to be busy than bored, right?
Anyway, good night!

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_020.text:
This is about as far from boring as it gets.
She's dead-serious about taking on these
aliens, while I'm one slip-up away from
being treated like one.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_030.text:
Well, the election's tomorrow, which doesn't
mean squat to me. Wonder what I should get
up to while everybody's out at the polls.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_000.text:
...That's weird. Where's Lita?
It's gettin' to be about the time
she'd be coming to wake me up.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_010.text:
Good morning! Sorry for the delay,
but I just finished voting.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_020.text:
Nice to see a lady getting her
civic duty taken care of early. Still, you sure you're good not doing
any reporting at the polling place?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_040.text:
Well, I guess we are on the trail of a pretty
big deal—and I gotta admit it's refreshing
how decisive you're being in all this. Anyhoo, am I free to just do
whatever I want today?

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_050.text:
Yep! That's why I decided to vote early.
Of course, if you're interested in the
polling place, I'm happy to go back.

SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_MIDO_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_060.text:
Anyway, today's news cycle is going
to be dominated by the election,
so let's hurry up and go!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text: Holy moly, look at all the people!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Electronic voting is pretty common outside
of Capitol City, but here, the old-fashioned
method of voting in person is alive and well. It's almost like a festival—or even
a ritual, I guess. Choosing a president
is just a really special time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah, and this is one big humdinger of
a country, so being the big cheese would
mean wielding some serious power.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh, it's not an exaggeration to say
the president wields total authority,
especially when it comes to times of
emergency and war. That's why... Huh? That's strange.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
What's going on there, bud?
You see somebody shifty, maybe?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Bingo. She looked like an election
official, but there's no reason for
her to be wandering around here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Huh? Hey, hold on there, bud!
...That lady does love just
leaping into the fray, huh?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Hi there. Lita Caryx with the Post.
Care to tell me what's in the
box there? Because it looks
an awful lot like ballot paper.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Ack! I can't believe someone saw me!
But yeah, that's right: it's ballot paper.
What are you going to do about it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You don't have enough ballots there to even
make a dent in the totals for Capitol City, much
less the entire Union States. Which means you're
trying to pull something else.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I'm guessing you WANT me to report this in order
to reduce people's faith in the election—because
whoever comes out of a fraudulent election is
going to see their power greatly undermined.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
And a weakened president leaves a giant
opening for aliens to take advantage of.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You aliens thought I'd be so hungry for a scoop
that I'd fall for an obvious trick like this?
Boy, that really grinds my gears—I should
punch you right in your smug face!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
C'mon, just a little punch?
A love tap? Fine. Boo. No punching.
What a buzzkill you are.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Now get the heck out of my sight you
little alien puke, and don't come back!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Right then. Time to contact everyone
and make sure this doesn't turn into
some huge kerfuffle.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_1.text:
All that matters now is that
we have a free and fair election.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Well, there you have it: the one who
started with the upper hand pulled
out the victory in the end. Despite everything that happened,
Allen was just the stronger candidate.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
But now the election's over—and once the
inauguration coverage is done, I imagine
my work will calm down for a while. Sooo...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Say, what do you have on the
books tomorrow? Anything?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
With the election over,
I was thinking I'd start up
my spirit search in earnest.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Well, I got a call from my contact at the
National Research Institute, and he wants
me to go to the Inspectorate tomorrow.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
He's a little fuzzy on the details,
but apparently an ally at the
Inspectorate needs a favor from us.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Heck, bud! You've got people from
the anti-alien organization working
in the Inspectorate? That's a big deal.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Oh, it's big all right—so big, in fact,
that I'm part of the group and don't
even know the entire scope of things. Anyway, sorry to drag you on another
errand, but let's head there tomorrow.
Good night.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Good morning, sunshine!
Let's get going.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I was told to come to the Inspectorate.
Should we just...wait here?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, wonderful! You dears both made it.
I'm the one who called you, but we
can't talk here. Please follow me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I can't believe YOU'RE
our ally here, Jessica!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
And I can't believe that fact evaded an
ace reporter like you! Hee hee hee! Well, I suppose I've been doing a good job—
which is good, because all of this wouldn't
have been possible otherwise.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
But it's not you I have business
with, Lita. It's Tsunanori Mido.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
We want to dispatch the aliens in Capitol City
before the next president takes office—and to
do it, we need your help. Please consider this a formal request
from the President of the Union States,
Tsunanori Mido, and weigh it appropriately.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I came to Capitol City to find spirit power.
That's why I did everything I did with Lita,
and it's what I expect to come away with
at the end of this whole deal.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
This thing between the Union States and the
aliens isn't really any of my beeswax—and as
a rule, I don't get involved in the beeswax
of other folks. I mean, heck. I'm not a god or a judge or even
a big deal at the end of the day. I'm just an
ordinary fella, and I've got no business handing
down judgment on people OR aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, Lita? You're his friend.
What do you think?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, I've been fighting the aliens,
so of course I want to see them
driven out of the country... But as Tsunanori's friend, I understand
exactly what he's talking about. He can't
just up and decide all aliens are evil;
that's not the kind of person he is.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I see. Well then, I suppose I've no choice
but to leave the decision in your hands.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
You need permission to operate
this particular elevator, dear.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Should I take the fact you're proceeding
to mean you will accept the request I
made of you earlier?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Won't know until I go and see—but I'll
protect the president even if it means
I don't end up getting the spirit I need.
That's a Mido promise.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
And I believe you, for I know the
value of a Mido promise.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: You coming with me, bud?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Of course! I can't miss the chance
to watch you get an actual spirit!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Then let's do this thing.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
There's no security here...
What's going on?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
They're making a move!
You all right, Mr. President!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
I don't know who you are,
but don't come near me!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Cripes, guy. We can't get this deal
started if we don't come over there! You better hide, Lita.
This could get ugly.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: STOP!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Stop! The enemy—

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Stop! The enemy is reacting
to your movements!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
So reckless! How many times did you
have to fight trying to come over here?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: That'd be three, Mr. President.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
You survived THREE battles?
You truly are a Mido... Despite the current situation,
I welcome you, Tsunanori Mido,
to the Office of the President
of the Union States. I take this to mean you have
accepted my request?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Seems I've got no choice but to protect you.
Also, I think I'll be able to get the spirit
I need if I do.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
My, my! Having you AND the president here
together certainly does save me some trouble—
for you both serve as obstacles to our
cooperation with the next president!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
I'm the one who's being saved trouble, guy,
'cause if we don't take out the boss of the
aliens, this deal is never gonna end.
So thanks for coming right to us!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Such arrogance! You'll soon realize we have
only been toying with you until now!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
And with that, I believe you've dealt with all
the aliens in the vicinity. I shudder to think
of what might have happened had you not arrived
when you did. Now all that remains is to capture the
remaining aliens before the transfer of power
to the next administration.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
What was your link to the alien fellas,
Mr. President? And why did you decide
they had to be dealt with now?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Eight years ago, shortly after I took
office, we learned of the existence
of the aliens. We knew we had to control the narrative of
such an explosive story, so we contacted them
and began a series of discreet dealings. Over time, I forged a policy in which
I sometimes accept their various demands,
but ultimately minimize their influence.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Seems like that wasn't
enough for 'em.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
It was not. Their demands have escalated
recently, up to and including things that
pose a threat to the very independence
of the Union States. We also received credible intelligence that
they were in contact with a presidential
candidate, at which point we had no choice
but to act.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
The existence of the anti-alien organization—
as well as you, Tsunanori Mido—pushed us
to make the decision we did.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Don't you think the fact you've kept
this from the public for eight years
is problematic, Mr. President?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: That's a question you would have as a reporter, yes? But what is your opinion as a member of the anti-alien organization? Do you truly think we should leave the question of how to deal with aliens up to the wider public?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, judging by how the aliens
have been conducting themselves...
No. No, we probably shouldn't.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
We arrived at the same conclusion.
We kept the aliens a secret in order
to protect the Union States, but also
because the aliens themselves wished it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Thanks to you all, the secret has been kept.
And I would ask that you continue to keep
all that has occurred here in the strictest
of confidences.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Now then, Tsunanori Mido, I hear you
came here in search of some spirits.
Were you able to find what you needed?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Not yet, sir—but I think one of 'em is
about to show. So with your permission,
I'd like to fight it and get its power.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
I would not dare stand in the way of
such an opportunity... And you, Lita?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Oh, I can't WAIT to see this.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_B_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_HUM_B_000_C.text:
I can't believe Bailey came from behind
and pulled it out! People are going to
be talking about this election for years.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Greetings. I am the President of the
Union States. Welcome to my office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I can't believe the president
was actually an alien!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text: Who are you?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Mr. President?
Cripes, there's two of him!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text: Wait, Tsunanori.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Jessica sent us here
to help, Mr. President.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, so she did. I take this to mean you
have dispatched the impersonator?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
We have, Mr. President—and I'm
glad we could be of assistance.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I first learned of the aliens eight years
ago when I took over from my predecessor. I'd always considered some of his policy decisions
to be strange, but in that instant, the mystery
was solved: the Union States' government was
being subjected to alien interference.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Throughout my eight years in office, I've
worked to weaken their influence, ignoring
the meager scraps they tried to toss our way.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I'm guessing they didn't much
care for that attitude.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
No, they did not. In fact, they found me so
difficult to deal with that they attempted
to interfere with the last election—but I was
re-elected anyway with the public's support.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Which brings us to the current election.
Knowing my successor would have trouble
dealing with the aliens, my administration
devised a plan to wipe them out. Sadly, they got the jump on me,
which was an inexcusable blunder
on my part as commander-in-chief.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
But thanks to all of your brave efforts,
we've managed to recover our position.
Now all that remains is to track down
the remaining aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
But what if more aliens come?
I mean, you won't be president forever.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
After I leave office, I plan to lead the anti-
alien organization. If there is another secret
invasion, I will reveal their existence and call
upon the Union States to stand against them.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Gotta say, it feels really good
to have a hero of the Channel War
leading our organization.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I'd like to offer special thanks to you,
Tsunanori Mido. If you have not yet found
the spirit you were searching for, simply
let me know, and I will offer what aid I can.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, this is a bit of a weird deal,
but I actually just got the power of
a metal spirit from you, Mr. President—
a spirit of leadership and righteousness.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Are you saying that I'm a spirit?
How amusing! What do you think, Lita?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I didn't believe there were any spirits in
our country, but it turns out there was one
here all along—and a perfect match for the
Union States, to boot!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Well, there you have it: the one who started
out with the upper hand pulled out the win.
Despite everything that happened, Allen was
just the stronger candidate in the end.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
This mean your work's gonna
calm down a bit, maybe?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'll have plenty of events to cover
until the inauguration, but things won't
be anywhere near as nuts as they were
during the election.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
In that case, mind helping me find a spirit
tomorrow? I think your information network
might be just the thing I need to get this
deal all wrapped up.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Happy to help. Also, I know I said I'd follow you
wherever, but it turns out you mostly ended
up following ME around on various stories—
real sorry about that. Anyway, good night.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Tsunanori, wake up! It's an emergency!
You have to come with me to the
laboratory right now!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Intermittent distortions have been observed
at the Office of the President. We've never
seen anything quite like this before.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text: Yes—and we should expect the worst.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
The police would laugh me out of the room
if I called them and said 'something's
happening at the president's office.'

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Guess we'll just have to sort
this out ourselves.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
But we need permission to use the elevator
to the presidential office, and making
a formal application takes forever!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Then we'll just force our way in. Here,
I hacked this ID to have full elevator
privileges, and you're welcome to use it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text: That really going to work, guy?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, it'll work, all right.
But going all the way to the
top is sure to get you caught.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Being caught means nothing compared
to what'll happen if we fail.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text:
Are you sure about this?
You know you don't have to come.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text:
Yeah. But you and Dr. Nishant
are sorta counting on me, eh?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text:
Well, when you put it that way... Yes.
I'll probably get killed six ways from
Sunday if I go up there on my own.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text:
You can count on me, bud.
We'll settle this thing.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text: But let's hang on a tick.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_010.text:
Robot security? Well, cripes.
Figures the Office of the President
would have something like this.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.text:
Guess we know what was causing the
distortion, but where's the president?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.text: Mr. President! Are you all right?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Lita, hang on. I think this
is an actual fella here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Hey there, guy. We detected one of those
spatial distortion deals in this office,
so we hacked the elevator and came up.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
So in other words, you're members
of the anti-alien organization. Well, I suppose that would make you
Tsunanori Mido, yes? I thank you for
showing up here just in time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
My administration is aware of the beings
you call aliens, and we have been keeping
a careful watch on their activities. That said, I never expected they might
mount such a bold attack so soon after
the presidential election.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
I'm guessing that robot president
was here to replace you, eh?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
They must have been mad to think they could
deceive our people with that thing, and yet
it's all a bit much for a practical joke.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Do you think they'll try
something like this again?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
I suspect the answer to that is yes,
although we'll attempt to use more
proactive measures moving forward. We'll need to hand power over to the
next administration, and I'm sure we'll
need your organization's help as well.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Now then, Tsunanori Mido!
I hear you are seeking spirits.
Did you find what you sought?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Sure did, Mr. President—right when
I fought the fake president just now.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
I was under the impression spirits
were more of a thing found in nature.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Everything in this world is a part of nature,
whether it's made by a person or a machine.
Spirits aren't about superficial appearances.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
A response I would expect from a man
of the East Islands Mido family.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MON_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_MON_000_CUT.text:
Bailey really turned things around for himself.
He's going to be a different kind of president
than what we've had before, and I'm looking
forward to what happens in the future.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
There's no security here?
What's going on?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
I hear something going
on over there. Let's go!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
Okay, what the heck?
TWO presidents?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
Well, cripes. Which one's the real
fella and which one's an alien?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
The president's staff look just
as confused as we are.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
Guess there's only one way
to find out, then! Hup!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text: Well, we found the real one.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
Are you CRAZY!? What was your
plan if you got the wrong one?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
A fair question—and yet, I love
the conviction you acted with!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
You didn't seem afraid at all there, guy.
Though I guess I should've expected that
from a big fish like you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
I imagine you are members of the anti-alien 
organization—which would make you Tsunanori
Mido, yes? Thank you for showing up here
just in time to save me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
I'm guessing that fake president
was here to replace you?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
Not yet, sir—but I bet you anything one's
about to show. So if you don't mind,
I'd like to fight it and take its power.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
I would not dare stand in the way of
such an opportunity... And you, Lita?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text: Oh, I cannot WAIT to see this.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Well, it's been quite the trip, but the next
president's finally been decided. Gotta say,
bud, that was actually pretty interesting.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Oh, don't get the idea that's how all our
elections go; this one was particularly
eventful. But hey, now I get to cover the
events leading up to the inauguration!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
So you won't be kicking those feet up anytime
soon, eh? As for me, it's time to get serious
about finding some spirits.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
I'm happy to help, if you want; it's not
like I'll need to be gathering stories
every minute of every day, after all.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
So you're gonna keep up your in-depth coverage
of my beeswax, bud? Heck, fine with me—you
know everything about everything around here,
so it'll be a big help to have you along.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Yeah, I am pretty good, aren't I?
In that case, we'll start your search
tomorrow. Good night, Tsunanori.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text: All right, let's get ready to go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Well, howdy there, partners! We're with
the marshal's office, and we're gonna
need this tall drink of water here to
come along with us.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Can't answer that one, hon.
Now shake your spurs.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Wait! If you're taking him, I'm coming.
I'm in the middle of covering him for an
in-depth story.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text: Sorry, darlin', but he goes alone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text: If she doesn't go, I don't go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Well, ain't you just a peach!
But fine. You want your gal along,
we'll go ahead and let 'er come.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.text:
So we're going to the
Office of the President?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.text:
We sure are, hon—and you've been
given official permission to tag along!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text: Go right in here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text: Fair enough.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Welcome to the Office of the President.
You must be Tsunanori Mido and Shungiku
Hanabusa— Ah, but you prefer Lita, yes? As you probably know, I am the
President of the Union States.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
I called you here today so we could
speak about the beings you call aliens.
Put simply, they do not exist.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
What? No! But we've seen them!
And we have hard observational data!

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
All of which are products
of government experiments.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Just as you created an anti-alien organization
to carry out your activities, the government
has also been conducting various experiments in
preparation for interference from other worlds. An example of this is the unique
'other dimension' you have experienced.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
You, Mr. Mido, have a higher than normal
chance to enter such special spaces—and I
believe you are well aware of the reason.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Your appearance here brought our experiments
to the next phase. It proved that interference
from the outside is a real possibility.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
These experiments will now be inherited
by the next administration—and it's all
thanks to you, Mr. Mido.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Okay, hang on! What about our organization!?
We've been working like dogs to protect this
country and its people, and it was all...
What? A waste!? A fantasy!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Sadly, Lita, I need you to bear an even
heavier burden: you must never let your
organization know the truth. I would have you carry out your activities
just as before—which is why you must
forget all that you learned here today.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
You may regret coming along with
Mr. Mido, but doing so was a choice
made by you alone. If you wish to hear my advice, I would suggest
you leave the organization entirely. I believe
your life would be much easier that way.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Some of your members, such as
Dr. Nishant, will be recruited to
other government organizations.
But as for you...

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
I understand, Mr. President. I'm a citizen
of the Union States, and I have pledged my
allegiance to the flag. I will do my duty. BUT! In exchange, I want an exclusive,
all-access, nothing-off-the-record
interview the day you leave office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
I agree to your terms—and in truth,
I rather expected this.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Hope you don't regret this, Mr. President!
'Cause after eight years in office, I have a
boatload of questions for you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Now, Mr. Mido, I have one more request for you:
I want you to leave the Union States immediately.
All traces of your existence will be purged;
not even the next administration will know. Seeing as you're a member of the Mido family,
I don't wish to leave behind any possible
sources of friction with the East Islands.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Well, guy, I'd like to agree to that,
but I've got my own terms to discuss. See, there should be a spirit appearing around
here before long. I couldn't leave even if
I wanted to without it, so I'm hoping you
won't mind if I fight the sucker.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Do spirits truly appear in Capitol City?
I'm quite interested in learning the answer
to that—and I'm certain your friend Lita
holds equal interest in the subject.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text: Oh, I wouldn't miss this for the world.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
So you're leaving us, Tsunanori?
...And, uh, through a manhole?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
This is just a guess on my part, but I think
forming a mental image of a door to another
world actually creates the real thing.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
That makes no sense at all.
You'd be a crummy journalist.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ha! Well, I'll scratch that off my list of possible
career paths, then. But hey, you really helped
me out of a few jams, and I appreciate it.
Take care of yourself, yeah?

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text: I know our time together was short, but it was also really fun.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
Wow. He's really gone. Thought he might
open the manhole cover and leave, but nope.
He's just...gone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_MIDO_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
...I hope we meet again someday,
Tsunanori Mido.
